database.name: MetabolomicsWorkbench
database.description: The Metabolomics Workbench will serve as a national and international repository for metabolomics data and metadata and will provide analysis tools and access to metabolite standards, protocols, tutorials, training, and more.

entry.name: Metabolomics Analysis of Diabetes and the Cori Cycle
entry.description: Metabolomics analysis was performed on muscle biopsy samples that were collected from the vastus lateralis 1-3 weeks prior to gastic bypass surgery and at 3 months post-surgery from four obese subjects for a total of eight samples. HPLC-MS data were acquired for the eight samples.
